content:
More precisely, a resource is Ö

  • A temporally varying membership function MR(t) that, for each time t, maps to some set of semantically equivalent values

  • Values may be resource representations or identifiers to other resources

  • Can map to the empty set, allowing references to be made to a concept before any realization of that concept exists

  • The resource is the conceptual mapping, not the entity that corresponds to that mapping at t
